MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Manor Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 5:25PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complications on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:42PM on 08 April 2021.
